name: Mnemotron
overview: Mnemotron is a simple, two-player game of Concentration, with the added twist that there are animated images on the tiles. There are two game modes: one of them is 'training' (allows you to solve any single level), and the other one is 'game' (you play through all the available levels in sequence.) There is a high score table for the best solvers. You can play with another human or with a computer (there are a couple of AI skill levels available). During the game, you click on any two covered tiles; if they match, a short tune plays (different for each picture). You get score for uncovering the tiles; once all of them are uncovered, the player with the higher score wins the level.
